DOC.brief_summary: This is a study that will follow transplant patients from Study A3921030 to monitor for long term safety, tolerability and efficacy for 5 additional years, except in Portugal where the study will follow transplant patients through Month 36 posttransplant. Patients will continue their study medications that were previously assigned.
DOC.brief_title: Extension Study Of Subjects From Study A3921030 For The Prevention Of Acute Rejection In Kidney Transplant Patients
DOC.criteria: Subjects who successfully completed Study A3921030 Subjects who are on the waiting list for a second kidney transplant or any nonrenal organ transplants
